transArray.content: Good environment, good service, convenient location

The hotel's reply: Dear guest, hello, thank you for your stay and review. We will continue to work hard and wholeheartedly provide you with high-quality services. Parking is available in our small courtyard and the surrounding transportation is convenient. It is less than one kilometer from Beijing Chaoyang Station and takes a short walk. In 15 minutes, the hotel has set up a free laundry room, food delivery robot, free reading area and tea area to provide value-for-money services for your travel.
